package.name: bigfootbot_teleop
package.description: Package enables joystick control of a robot in ROS 2. It includes nodes for interfacing with the joystick ('joy_node') and converting joystick inputs into robot movement commands ('teleop_node'). The joystick inputs are published as 'sensor_msgs/msg/Joy' messages, while the converted movement commands are outputted as 'geometry_msgs/msg/Twist' messages to the '/cmd_vel' topic.
